name="AdapterId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="RegistryId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="PoolId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="FirmwareSupportsUpgrade" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="FirmwareSlotCount" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="StorageIdCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StorageIdCodeSet" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StorageIdType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DiskNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HiddenPartitionsCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HiddenPartitions" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt" count="HiddenPartitionsCount"/> </template>

Event.Message: Critical partition error: failed to change the layout for disk %1 due to partition %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DiskNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PartitionNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Service partition error: failed to set partition information for disk %1 partition %2.
